attributes.action: Abolish road tax, put it on fuel at the pump; true pay as you drive!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No fancy gadgets to go wrong or fiddle, the more you use, the more you pay - simple.  Everyone who uses petroleum based fossil fuel for an engine will pay.  Reduce the price of 'Bio' fuels, hence encouraging lower carbon foot prints.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
